result.reason: Random 20-30s UI freeze during SSH/RDP connections reported in 2020 on v1.76; confirmed by multiple users but no specific repro steps, no logs, and no response to our Feb 2026 triage refresh requesting retest on latest build
result.approach: Likely UI-thread blocking during connection setup (synchronous DNS, network calls, or cross-thread marshaling). Needs reporter confirmation on v1.81.0 before investing in fix. If confirmed, audit connection Open() paths for synchronous calls on UI thread and move to async/background threads.

attempts.raw_output:
